overview: Creator and porn legend Max Lincoln makes his long-awaited return to the director's chair with CamBoy for the DreamBoy series. Based around the growing webcam-sex scenarios that we've all played around with, CamBoy follows the beautifully Scandinavian Johannes Winter as he explores himself and others across Europe using his delicious dick at every opportunity. A double disc set comprised of unseen webcam shows from the stars, CamBoy contains over three hours of the very best sex.
title: CamBoy
